UPW.questionText: Has the individual gone through any part of a process to change the sex they were assigned at birth to the gender they now identify with, or do they intend to?
Give details and discuss placement options with the individual, based on their gender identity. Record their preference and the details of the conversation.
Is the individual intersex or do they have a Difference in Sexual Development (DSD)?
Do they consider themselves to be transgender or have a transgender history?
UPW.helpText: This could include their name, appearance, the way they dress, taking hormones, or having gender-confrming surgery.

UPW.questionText: Does the individual have any placement preferences?
Discuss placement options with the individual, based on their gender identity
UPW.helpText: Record their preference and the details of the conversation.

UPW.questionText: Individual poses a risk to children?
Has the individual been involved in serious group offending (SGO)?
History of hate-based attitudes or behaviours?
UPW.helpText: For example, homophobic or racially motivated

UPW.questionText: Is the individual vulnerable because they are a high-profile person?
UPW.helpText: For example, they are prominent on social media or are well-known in a particular area.

UPW.questionText: Additional risk assessment information relevant to Community Payback?
Location restricted by victim exclusion criteria?
Close supervision or restricted placement recommended?
Recommend not to place with female supervisor?
Recommend not to place with male supervisor?
Are there any risk management issues for an individual placement?
Are there any risk management issues if working in a supervised group?
Alcohol or drug issues with health and safety impact?
Do any of the above affect the individual’s ability to engage with Community Payback?
Does the individual have any travel issues that will affect their placement?
Does the individual have a valid driving licence?
Do they have access to a vehicle?
Is public transport available and accessible to the individual?
Is the individual in employment or education?
Employment or education details (working days, hours etc)
Employment or education details (working days, hours etc)
Does the individual have any difficulties with reading, writing or numbers?
Does the individual have any work skills or experience that could be used while carrying out Community Payback?
Does the individual have future work plans that could be supported through a Community Payback placement?
Does the individual have an education, training or employment-related need?
Does the individual agree to use the maximum entitlement of their hours on this activity?
Is the individual eligible for intensive working?
Recommended hours per week in addition to statutory minimum, at the start of the order
UPW.helpText: 7 hours is the standard working day. Maximum of 21 additional hours per week.

UPW.questionText: Recommended hours per week in addition to statutory minimum, at the midpoint of the order
UPW.helpText: 7 hours is the standard working day. Maximum of 21 additional hours per week.

UPW.questionText: At what point should the individual be expected to reach a 28-hour working week?
When is the individual available for  work?
I confirm the individual has received details of their Community Payback Induction Session
